reuters.title: RAPID-AMERICAN COMPLETES K MART <KM> STORE BUY
reuters.body: Privately-held Rapid-American Corp said it has completed the previously-announced acquisition of 66 Kresge and Jupiter stores from K Mart Corp. The company said it plans to operate 57 of the stores as McCrory Five and 10 variety stores and close the others by the end of July. Reuter 
